betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The alveary provides you the ability to give your bees a proper enviroment for them to work in by meeting their climatory needs. You do this by putting these blocks in your alveary but not in the top row of alveary blocks.

The Alveary Fan allows you to move the temperature of an alveary down 1 for each powered fan.

The Alveary Heater allows you to move the temperature of an alveary up 1 for each powered heater.

The Alveary Hydroregulator allows you to raise or lower the humidity of the alveary 20% by using water or lava respectivly. You can use multiple of them but note that they have a slight effect on the temperature effecting it by 10%

The Alveary Lighting tricks bees into thinking it is daytime.

The Rain Shield will make them able to work in the rain.
